document.p: The ALG Configuration allows you to set SIP ALG. When an INVITE message is sent out across the firewall, the SIP Application Layer Gateway (ALG) collects information from the message header into a call table, which it uses to forward subsequent messages to the correct endpoint.
Under ALG Configuration, you can configure the following settings:
document.li1:
ALG SIP:
Allows you to enable or disable SIP ALG.
